name: The Crete Escape
description:
Escape from Crete on wax wings.

Ludum Dare Page here!

WASD/Arrow keys to move, Z/Space to jump. Hold jump/up to slow fall, press down to fast fall.

Pressing "0" will reset the leaderboards!

Works with controllers!

Game by @KaiClavier

Art by @IMPLODINGORACLE

(Sorry, no audio for this one yet!)

My high score is 1895!

(Also, it's pronounced "Creet", so now you can sound super-smart to your friends!)
